Become a homechoice Sales Agent and flourish as a digital entrepreneur with a life-changing income or you can choose to earn enough to suit your lifestyle. You can do it in your own time, whether it’s part-time or full-time, and your earning potential is unlimited! The life you’ve been dreaming of can start becoming a reality today!
What do I need to become a Sales Agent?
  • Be digitally-and tech-savvy (comfortable using technology and online platforms)
  • Have a SA ID or passport
  • Be 18 years or older
  • Own a smartphone or tablet
  • Have an entrepreneurial mindset
  • Have the desire to earn extra cash
What’s in it for me?
  • Unlimited and uncapped earning potential
  • Bonus commission when signing up new customers
  • Dedicated online support and training tools to set you up for success
  • Flexible working hours
  • Self-empowerment
  • A life-changing opportunity
